title: One, Two, Three!: A Happy Counting Book
description: How many animals will you see? A whole lot more than ONE, TWO, THREE!A wacky crew of hippos, cats, pigs, and cows lead kids from a quiet One to a "LOUD LOUD LOUD" Ten-and back to quiet One again. From Boynton on Board, the bestselling series of extra-big, extra-fat, and extra-fun board books, here is One, Two, Three! , a counting book as only Sandra Boynton could do a counting book. Filled with her humorous, colorful drawings and lively text, One, Two, Three! is an adventure with numbers that kids and their parents will love.Main selection of the Children's Book-of-the-Month Club. Suitable for ages 1-4.
author: Sandra Boynton
